request.specialInstructions:
Meeting in Cahners theater from 6:00 to 6:40pm A/V needed only for the meeting portion, not the reception
- Powerpoint projection on screen Microphone and podium next to screen Remote clicker thing Audio Recording of the meeting 3 Lavaliere mics if possible

AV needs: * Tech available for entire event in Cahners Theater; ready to greet client at 8 AM, with event running in-theater 9 AM - 5 PM * Equipment needs in Cahners Theater: podium/mic, LCD projection, (1) additional handheld wireless mic for audience QandA., clicker to advance slides, podium/mic * Client to supply own laptop (non-high-def); please prepare for sound in presentations

* AV tech check-in at 9 AM * Please set on the Charles River side of the suite - podium/mic, LCD projection, drop-down screen - please prepare for sound in the presentations. Client to supply her own (non-high-definition) laptops.

legacyFiles.legacyFile: 5883/11-8-2016 Tues. - Copyright Clearance Center - d''ARb NEEDS SHEET.pdf

request.specialInstructions:
We need a laptop set up around 8:45 for the GSO I.
Thank you!

* Cable feed for election coverage via our 65” LCD screen placed in “nook” on Charles River side of the suite (Please make sure Marjie knows how to operate - turn on/off, change channels, change volume) before you head home for the night (Marjie on site around 2:30 PM) * Remove all other AV equipment from room, please (no podium, etc.)
Presentation or logo for CSandT screen to be scheduled

* Tech available for entire event in Cahners Theater; ready to greet client at 8 AM, with event running in-theater 9 AM - 5:15 PM * Equipment needs in Cahners Theater: podium/mic, LCD projection, (1) additional handheld wireless mic for audience QandA., clicker to advance slides * Client to supply own laptop (non-high-def); please prepare for sound in presentations

AV tech requested for event, on-site, in room, as of 8:30 AM. Client arrives at 8:30 AM, will most likely need trial AV run before event gets going. Program runs 10:00 AM - 3:00 PM. Podium/mic (SET TO LEFT OF SCREEN), (1) handheld wireless mic, (4) lav mics for “panelist session” (held at high cab tables set to right of screen), Skyline LCD projector, screen, sound cord, clicker to advance slides. Client to provide laptop(s) with presentations loaded in. See Function Coordinator for latest event schedule.

legacyFiles.legacyFile: 5880/11-9-2016 Wed. - Harvard Pilgrim HealthCare Foundation - Skyline NEEDS SHEET.pdf

request.specialInstructions: AV needs: None (only background music to be played thru soundsystem). Please clear room of all AV equipment - no podium/mic needed either.
BWSS in Atrium Feed from DJ Projectors on simulators 1 wireless HH

- PLEASE CHANGE DELIVERY TO TECH NEEDED FOR SETUP ABOVE - thanks! - Client (again) contracting for Webcast services and a lot of AV thru Nasdaq (the former Thomson Reuters). Subcontractors A.V. Presentations (: ) ) To my understanding, this means Nasdaq supplies: whatever they need for mobile microphones (lavs, handheld), mixing board, speakers AND Webcast services. - BUT MoS AV to supply: podium/mic, Skyline LCD projector and drop-down screen. I've submitted an AV sheet for these and requested an AV tech check-in with this vendor sometime around 8:00 AM -- THANKS!

legacyFiles.legacyFile: 5890/11-10-2016 Thurs. - iRobot event in SKyline NEEDS SHEET.pdf

request.specialInstructions: We will be setting up a laptop to display a PowerPoint presentation during the meeting. 11:30 is the actual meeting start time. It was not possible to reserve room prior to meeting for setup.

Guest Speakers arrive at 11:00 am at the Hodge to present to the Volunteer Board of Directors. I need a tech to assist with the set up in Hodge please. I never know if the speaker will bring a mac or pc. Thank you in advance! Also, the meetings begin a half hour earlier than previous years. Last year speakers arrived at 10:30 am now it is 11:00 am.

Powerpoint set up is needed for this meeting. Please have set up completed at 2:30pm.
Thanks, Gina

Presentation from CSandT Stage
Podium/Mic 3 lavaliers CSandT screen in use with PPT Wireless mic for QandA iPod hookup

AV tech check-in at 8:30 AM. Client will be running laptop (understand will be bringing in both a Mac and PC) for LCD presentations at a small round table set to the right of the podium/mic. Will be using Skyline LCD projection, drop down screen; please supply sound cord(s).

request.specialInstructions: The cahners keynote will start at 10:30am and go until 11:15am. We will need to play a powerpoint and audio, a lav mic, 2 handheld mics, and a podium if available.
We will be using both skyline for our workshop/activity, and Cahners theater for our keynote at 10:30am. Skyline will need a podium and mic, and we will be displaying a powerpoint and audio.
Just podium/mic requested, centered along blank wall to right of Omni door. No LCD projection planned. Function Coordinators may load in background music CDs.
